answers.answer: They may monitor you closely and they may end up taking the baby early.

question: Saw my doctor today and my blood pressure was 141/84 and I had gained 6lbs in a week, not to mention the swelling in my face and hands. She is having me tested for preeclampsia just wondering if anyone has experienced this and can give me a little insight as to what I can expect if I have this condition... it's been a rough pregnancy and I'm pretty scared
title: Preeclampsia
